formattedAddress: 305 E 40th St #1a, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 305 E 40th St #1a, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text:
Dr. Rudick is an exceptional doctor - he is thorough and attentive during each of my office visits.

Dr. Rudick is my eye doctor and he also recently performed my LASIK procedure. He ensured all of my questions were answered prior to the procedure and checked in at several time points throughout the procedure, while explaining each step during the procedure.

I had a follow up visit with him the following day and he assured me that I was recovering well and remained patient as I asked more recovery questions. I’m very thankful I found Dr. Rudick and I’m forever appreciative that he restored my vision.

12/10 highly recommend you go see Dr. Rudick for all of your eye care needs, especially if you are considering LASIK!

originalText.text: Dr Rudick was so awesome - I had my PRK eye surgery with him and he was wonderful. Everything went perfectly and I was thrilled! 10/10 recommend

text.text: Dr Rudick was so awesome - I had my PRK eye surgery with him and he was wonderful. Everything went perfectly and I was thrilled! 10/10 recommend

originalText.text: I had an amazing experience with Dr Rudick performing my Lasik procedure. He’s knowledgable and calm, making sure you’re informed every step of the way. I couldn’t be happier with the end result.

text.text: I had an amazing experience with Dr Rudick performing my Lasik procedure. He’s knowledgable and calm, making sure you’re informed every step of the way. I couldn’t be happier with the end result.

originalText.text: I can't recommend Dr. Rudick enough. He is a thoughtful, thorough eye doctor and is helpful whenever I have questions. He also recommended plugs as a solution to my dry eyes and they work great! So glad I have them now.

text.text: I can't recommend Dr. Rudick enough. He is a thoughtful, thorough eye doctor and is helpful whenever I have questions. He also recommended plugs as a solution to my dry eyes and they work great! So glad I have them now.

originalText.text: Great experience! Got Lasik and PRK with Dr. Ruddick. Highly recommend. Have been seeing him for about 10 years now.

text.text: Great experience! Got Lasik and PRK with Dr. Ruddick. Highly recommend. Have been seeing him for about 10 years now.
